comment: /**  * Tells whether all the features provided as argument are supported  */
code: /**  * Tells whether all the features provided as argument are supported  */ public static boolean areAllSupported(List<String> features) {     for (String feature : features) {         if (feature.equals("xpack")) {             if (false == ESRestTestCase.hasXPack()) {                 return false.             }         } else if (feature.equals("no_xpack")) {             if (ESRestTestCase.hasXPack()) {                 return false.             }         } else if (false == SUPPORTED.contains(feature)) {             return false.         }     }     return true. }
